arts.ttl: Aston Villa 0-3 Crystal Palace: Eagles sink the Villans as attacking issues persist
arts.sum: Jean-Philippe Mateta opened the scoring from the penalty spot before Marc Guehi and Ismaila Sarr added to the scoresheet - Villa were left unable to respond. For Aston Villa, the international break comes at the perfect time as his side put in another disjointed performance, failing to score for the third successive match in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Liverpool close in on deal for Crystal Palace captain Marc Guehi - despite Eagles boss Oliver Glasner insisting his side MUST keep him after starring against Aston Villa
arts.sum: LEWIS STEELE: The two clubs are in negotiations after the Reds had an official bid of £35million turned down on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Guéhi’s stunner inspires Crystal Palace to emphatic victory at Aston Villa
arts.sum: Two star players on the verge of moves to bigger clubs from Crystal Palace and Aston Villa respectively reflected the state of the spirit within their camps as Marc Guéhi’s memorable strike rubber-stamped the Londoners’ latest triumph over the West Midlanders. We will never know whether Emiliano Martínez would have saved it as the Villa goalkeeper was unavailable for selection amid reports of Manchester United’s renewed interest. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Guehi scores as Crystal Palace thump Aston Villa
arts.sum: Watch highlights as Crystal Palace earned their first Premier League win of the season with an impressive display against a flat Aston Villa side.

arts.ttl: Marc Guehi among Crystal Palace’s scorers in easy win at struggling Aston Villa
arts.sum: The England defender has been heavily linked with a move to Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Guehi scores stunner as Palace beat poor Villa
arts.sum: Marc Guehi scored a stunning goal on the eve of Deadline Day as he put his transfer links to Liverpool to one side to help Crystal Palace to a 3-0 victory at Aston Villa, where alarm bells are ringing.

arts.ttl: Aston Villa player ratings vs Crystal Palace: Evann Guessand woeful, 7/10 impresses

arts.ttl: Aston Villa 0-3 Crystal Palace: Marc Guehi curls in fine goal amid transfer links as Eagles earn first Premier League win of season
arts.sum: Report and free match highlights from the Premier League match between Aston Villa and Crystal Palace as Jean-Philippe Mateta, Marc Guehi and Ismaila Sarr secure impressive win for Oliver Glasners side; Emi Martinez absent for hosts amid transfer links to Man Utd
